snippet: Adapted by Simon Stephens from Mark Haddon’s best-selling 2003 novel about an autistic boy’s coming-of-age, this is one of the most fully immersive works ever to wallop Broadway.
abstract: Ben Brantley reviews Simon Stephens play The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time, directed by Marianne Elliott and starring Alex Sharp at Ethel Barrymore Theater.
